QuestData.Title: From the Mouth of Madness
QuestData.Description: I know of a draught that should jolt these gibbering former slaves back to reality. Gather some stonebloom from the rocks around Gar'gol's hovel, some bitterblossom from the shores of the nearby lake, and a darkflame ember from one of the braziers at the hovel entrance. The draught won't last long, so combine the ingredients at a twilight cauldron by the entrance to the hovel.$B$BOne sip of that draught should knock some sense into the brainwashed slaves!
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather up Stonebloom, Bitterblossom, and a Darkflame Ember.
QuestData.CompletionText: <The cauldron burbles, filled with a disgusting liquid.>
QuestData.RewardText: <You dump out the current contents of the cauldron, instantly killing the surrounding plant life.>$B$B<The draught you brew in its place boils chunky and reeks of rotted cabbage. You turn your head aside and bottle it up.>
